cards.name: Adarkar Unicorn
cards.text: {T}: Add {U} or {C}{U}. Spend this mana only to pay cumulative upkeep costs.
cards.flavor:
"There is no nobler creature in all of Terisiare."
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Arctic Foxes
cards.text: Arctic Foxes can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or greater as long as defending player controls a snow land.
cards.flavor:
"Those Foxes are wily, swift, and ferocious. They are the warriors of the snows."
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Arenson's Aura
cards.text:
{W}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Destroy target enchantment.
{3}{U}{U}: Counter target enchantment spell.
cards.flavor:
"I have my faith, and I have my prayers. But if push comes to shove, I've also got a little something extra."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Armor of Faith
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{W}: Enchanted creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Keep your chainmail, warrior. I have my own form of protection."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Battle Cry
cards.text:
Untap all white creatures you control.
Whenever a creature blocks this turn, it gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"In the thick of battle, you must keep your wits about you. Yelling a lot helps, too."
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Black Scarab
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked by black creatures.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a black permanent.

cards.name: Blessed Wine
cards.text:
You gain 1 life.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"May the bounty of Kjeld enrich your days."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Blinking Spirit
cards.text: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Don't look at it! Maybe it'll go away!"
-Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

cards.name: Blue Scarab
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked by blue creatures.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a blue permanent.

cards.name: Call to Arms
cards.text:
As Call to Arms enters the battlefield, choose a color and an opponent.
White creatures get +1/+1 as long as the chosen color is the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls but isn't tied for most common.
When the chosen color isn't the most common color among nontoken permanents the chosen player controls or is tied for most common, sacrifice Call to Arms.

cards.name: Caribou Range
cards.text:
Enchant land you control
Enchanted land has "{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 0/1 white Caribou creature token."
Sacrifice a Caribou token: You gain 1 life.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: Black
cards.text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: Blue
cards.text: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: Green
cards.text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: Red
cards.text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Circle of Protection: White
cards.text: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

cards.name: Cold Snap
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Cold Snap deals damage to that player equal to the number of snow lands they control.
cards.flavor: Who knows from whence the winter comes?

cards.name: Cooperation
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:
"The Elves train our healers, and we keep the Orcs at bay. Most Elvish bargains aren't as fair."
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Death Ward
cards.text: Regenerate target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Sometimes, a soul is not ready to complete its journey to the next world."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Disenchant
cards.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew!"
-Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

cards.name: Drought
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Drought unless you pay {W}{W}.
Spells cost an additional "Sacrifice a Swamp" to cast for each black mana symbol in their mana costs.
Activated abilities cost an additional "Sacrifice a Swamp" to activate for each black mana symbol in their activation costs.

cards.name: Elvish Healer
cards.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. If it's a green creature, prevent the next 2 damage instead.
cards.flavor:
"The Kjeldorans keep the Orcs at bay and we train their healers. Most human bargains aren't as fair."
-Laina of the Elvish Council

cards.name: Enduring Renewal
cards.text:
Play with your hand revealed.
If you would draw a card, reveal the top card of your library instead. If it's a creature card, put it into your graveyard. Otherwise, draw a card.
Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return it to your hand.
cards.flavor: That which lasts longest serves best.

cards.name: Energy Storm
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt by instant and sorcery spells.
Creatures with flying don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

cards.name: Formation
cards.text:
Target creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"I have been a warrior for over four hundred years, and yet each generation of Kjeldorans teaches me new tricks. There can be no better allies."
-Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

cards.name: Fylgja
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Fylgja enters the battlefield with four healing counters on it.
Remove a healing counter from Fylgja: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature this turn.
{2}{W}: Put a healing counter on Fylgja.

cards.name: General Jarkeld
cards.text: {T}: Choose two target blocked attacking creatures. If each of those creatures could be blocked by all creatures that the other is blocked by, each creature that's blocking exactly one of those attacking creatures stops blocking it and is blocking the other attacking creature. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step.

cards.name: Green Scarab
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked by green creatures.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a green permanent.

cards.name: Hallowed Ground
cards.text: {W}{W}: Return target nonsnow land you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"On this site where Kjeld's blood was spilled, let none raise a fist or deny a beggar."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Heal
cards.text:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"Sometimes even the smallest boon can save a life."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Hipparion
cards.text: Hipparion can't block creatures with power 3 or greater unless you pay {1}.
cards.flavor:
"Someone once said that Hipparions are to Warriors what Aesthir are to Skyknights. Don't believe it."
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Justice
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Justice unless you pay {W}{W}.
Whenever a red creature or spell deals damage, Justice deals that much damage to that creature's or spell's controller.

cards.name: Kelsinko Ranger
cards.text: {1}{W}: Target green creature gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Rangers not trained by the Elves just aren't the same."
-Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

cards.name: Kjeldoran Elite Guard
cards.text: {T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Elite Guard. Activate this ability only during combat.
cards.flavor: The winged helms of the Guard are put on for pageants-but taken off for war.

cards.name: Kjeldoran Guard
cards.text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Kjeldoran Guard. Activate this ability only during combat and only if defending player controls no snow lands.

cards.name: Kjeldoran Knight
cards.text:
Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
{1}{W}: Kjeldoran Knight gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{W}{W}: Kjeldoran Knight gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Those who do not ride the wind on Aesthir still command loyalty and respect."
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Kjeldoran Phalanx
cards.text: First strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:
"There's nothing I like better than watching a street full of soldiers kicking down the doors of the guilty and the impure."
-Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

cards.name: Kjeldoran Royal Guard
cards.text: {T}: All combat damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures this turn is dealt to Kjeldoran Royal Guard instead.
cards.flavor:
"Honorable in battle, generous in death."
-Motto of the Kjeldoran Royal Guard

cards.name: Kjeldoran Skycaptain
cards.text: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:
"If we do our duty and uphold our honor, Kjeldor shall stand for a thousand years."
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Kjeldoran Skyknight
cards.text: Flying; first strike; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:
"My Aesthir is my most trusted ally. We fight as one and live as one, and we will die as one."
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Kjeldoran Warrior
cards.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:
"Give me a thousand such Warriors and I could change the world."
-Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

cards.name: Lightning Blow
cards.text:
Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"If you do it right, they'll never know what hit them."
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Lost Order of Jarkeld
cards.text:
As Lost Order of Jarkeld enters the battlefield, choose an opponent.
Lost Order of Jarkeld's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of creatures the chosen player controls.
cards.flavor:
"Let us remember brave Jarkeld and his troops, who perished in the Adarkar Wastes so long ago."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Mercenaries
cards.text: {3}: The next time Mercenaries would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Any player may activate this ability.
cards.flavor:
"Blasted amateurs! Doesn't the queen think we can fight well enough on our own?"
-Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

cards.name: Order of the Sacred Torch
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Counter target black spell.

cards.name: Order of the White Shield
cards.text:
Protection from black
{W}: Order of the White Shield gains first strike until end of turn.
{W}{W}: Order of the White Shield gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Shall we turn away a worthy soul because his parents were peasants? I think not."
-Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

cards.name: Prismatic Ward
cards.text:
Enchant creature
As Prismatic Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature by sources of the chosen color.
cards.flavor:
"These, of all spells, must have common components I can isolate and use."
-Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Rally
cards.text: Blocking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Stand your ground, troops! This shall be our finest hour!"
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox, last words

cards.name: Red Scarab
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked by red creatures.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a red permanent.

cards.name: Sacred Boon
cards.text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, put a +0/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way.
cards.flavor:
"Divine gifts are granted to those who are worthy."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Seraph
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Seraph this turn dies, put that card onto the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. Sacrifice the creature when you lose control of Seraph.

cards.name: Shield Bearer
cards.text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:
"You have almost completed your four years, my son. Soon you shall be a Skyknight."
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Snow Hound
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Return Snow Hound and target green or blue creature you control to their owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"If you're starving, eat your horses, your dead, or yourself-but never eat your dog."
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Swords to Plowshares
cards.text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
cards.flavor:
"The so-called Barbarians will not respect us for our military might-they will respect us for our honor."
-Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

cards.name: Warning
cards.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target attacking creature this turn.
cards.flavor:
"The folk of the Karplusan Mountains are impossible to ambush."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: White Scarab
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked by white creatures.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent controls a white permanent.

cards.name: Arnjlot's Ascent
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
{1}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"The dreams of a child fulfilled: The wind on my brow, the air 'neath my feet."
-Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

cards.name: Balduvian Conjurer
cards.text: {T}: Target snow land becomes a 2/2 creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
cards.flavor:
"The very lands of Balduvia are alive."
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Balduvian Shaman
cards.text: {T}: Change the text of target white enchantment you control that doesn't have cumulative upkeep by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (For example, you may change "black creatures can't attack" to "blue creatures can't attack.") That enchantment gains "Cumulative upkeep {1}." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

cards.name: Binding Grasp
cards.text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Binding Grasp unless you pay {1}{U}.
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +0/+1.
cards.flavor:
"What I want, I take."
-Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

cards.name: Brainstorm
cards.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor:
"I reeled from the blow, and then suddenly, I knew exactly what to do. Within moments, victory was mine."
-Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

cards.name: Breath of Dreams
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Green creatures have "Cumulative upkeep {1}."
cards.flavor:
"Get up, blast you! They're attacking! Why are you all so slow?"
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Clairvoyance
cards.text:
Look at target player's hand.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"As we followed the ice wall, we had the distinct feeling of being watched. Many of the party wanted to turn back."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor:
"The duel was going badly for me, and Zur thought I was finished. He boasted that he would eat my soul-but all he ate were his words."
-Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

cards.name: Deflection
cards.text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
cards.flavor:
Up and down,
over and through,
back around-
the joke's on you.

cards.name: Dreams of the Dead
cards.text: {1}{U}: Return target white or black creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains "Cumulative upkeep {2}." If the creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else. (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

cards.name: Enervate
cards.text:
Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"Worlds turn in crucial moments of decision. Make your choice."
-Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

cards.name: Errant Minion
cards.text:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay any amount of mana. Errant Minion deals 2 damage to that player. Prevent X of that damage, where X is the amount of mana that player paid this way.
cards.flavor: Abandon not your faith when others abandon you.

cards.name: Essence Flare
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.
cards.flavor: Never underestimate the power of the soul unleashed.

cards.name: Force Void
cards.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"My mind and spirit are one-a barrier not readily passed."
-Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

cards.name: Glacial Wall
cards.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
cards.flavor:
"We are farther west than any could have imagined possible, but I still wish to press on. Unfortunately, huge walls of ice block further travel. We can't believe they are natural."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Hydroblast
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Counter target spell if it's red.
• Destroy target permanent if it's red.
cards.flavor:
"Heed the lessons of our time: the forms of water may move the land itself and hold captive the fires within."
-Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

cards.name: Iceberg
cards.text:
Iceberg enters the battlefield with X ice counters on it.
{3}: Put an ice counter on Iceberg.
Remove an ice counter from Iceberg: Add {C}.

cards.name: Icy Prison
cards.text:
When Icy Prison enters the battlefield, exile target creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Icy Prison unless any player pays {3}.
When Icy Prison leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Illusionary Forces
cards.text:
Flying
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
cards.flavor:
"This school was founded in secret, operates in secret, and exists for the teaching of secrets. Those who would alter reality must first escape it."
-Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

cards.name: Illusionary Presence
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a land type. Illusionary Presence gains landwalk of the chosen type until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)
cards.flavor:
"We could feel the Shaman's power, as surely as we felt the storm."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Illusionary Terrain
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
As Illusionary Terrain enters the battlefield, choose two basic land types.
Basic lands of the first chosen type are the second chosen type.
cards.flavor:
"The drawing of maps is fruitless in the west near the ice walls; the very earth is formless."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Illusionary Wall
cards.text:
Defender, flying, first strike
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
cards.flavor:
"Let them see what is not there and feel what does not touch them. When they no longer trust their senses, that is the time to strike."
-Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

cards.name: Illusions of Grandeur
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When Illusions of Grandeur enters the battlefield, you gain 20 life.
When Illusions of Grandeur leaves the battlefield, you lose 20 life.

cards.name: Infuse
cards.text:
Untap target artifact, creature, or land.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"The potential for change lies in all things. Know a thing's nature, know its possibilities, and know it anew."
-Gustha Ebbasdotter, Kjeldoran Royal Mage

cards.name: Krovikan Sorcerer
cards.text:
{T}, Discard a nonblack card: Draw a card.
{T}, Discard a black card: Draw two cards, then discard one of them.
cards.flavor:
"These Sorcerers always seem to have another surprise up their sleeves."
-Zur the Enchanter

cards.name: Magus of the Unseen
cards.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Untap target artifact an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the artifact, tap it.

cards.name: Mesmeric Trance
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
{U}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Magic overused can freeze the mind. Creativity is more important than power."
-Zur the Enchanter

cards.name: Mistfolk
cards.text: {U}: Counter target spell that targets Mistfolk.
cards.flavor:
"Although my official log will state there is no evidence pointing to the existence of the Mistfolk, my certainty is lessened by the cursed consistency of the expedition's eyewitness accounts."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Musician
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
{T}: Put a music counter on target creature. If it doesn't have "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature unless you pay {1} for each music counter on it," it gains that ability.

cards.name: Mystic Might
cards.text:
Enchant land you control
Cumulative upkeep {1}{U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn."

cards.name: Mystic Remora
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {4}.

cards.name: Phantasmal Mount
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Target creature you control with toughness 2 or less gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. When Phantasmal Mount leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice that creature. When the creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Phantasmal Mount.

cards.name: Polar Kraken
cards.text:
Trample
Polar Kraken enters the battlefield tapped.
Cumulative upkeep-Sacrifice a land. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
cards.flavor:
"It was big. Really, really, big. No, bigger than that. It was big!"
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Portent
cards.text:
Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order. You may have that player shuffle their library.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Power Sink
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

cards.name: Ray of Command
cards.text: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

cards.name: Ray of Erasure
cards.text:
Target player mills a card.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"What is real can be unreal."

cards.name: Reality Twist

cards.name: Sea Spirit

cards.flavor:

cards.name: Shyft

cards.flavor:

-Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

cards.name: Sibilant Spirit
cards.text:
Flying

-Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

cards.name: Silver Erne
cards.text: Flying, trample
cards.flavor:
"I've seen a larger Erne knock a Giant to the ground and stay airborne. They move not with the wind, but as the wind."
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Sleight of Mind

cards.name: Snow Devil

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.

cards.flavor:
"Give me wings to fly and speed to strike. In return, the glory I earn shall be yours."
-Steinar Icefist, Balduvian Shaman

cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {U} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Whenever an Island is tapped for mana, its controller may add an additional {U}. If that Island is snow, its controller may add an additional {U}{U} instead. Spend this mana only to pay cumulative upkeep costs.

cards.name: Soldevi Machinist
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to activate abilities of artifacts.
cards.flavor:

-Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
{U}: Thunder Wall gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Updraft
cards.text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:

-Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

cards.name: Wind Spirit
cards.text:
Flying
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
cards.flavor:
"To visit the sky requires bravery, and thought, and little else. To master the sky requires the binding of its masters, and little else."
-Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared.
X can't be greater than the number of snow lands you control.

cards.text: Return target creature and all white Auras you own attached to it to their owners' hands.
cards.flavor:
"It was in Urza's journals that I finally found the secret at the core of the summonings."
-Journal, author unknown

cards.text:
When Wrath of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all red creatures.
Red creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
cards.flavor: Dread Marit Lage lies dreaming, not dead.

cards.text:
Players play with their hands revealed.
If a player would draw a card, they reveal it instead. Then any other player may pay 2 life. If a player does, put that card into its owner's graveyard. Otherwise, that player draws a card.

cards.name: Zuran Enchanter
cards.text: {2}{B}, {T}: Target player discards a card. Activate this ability only during your turn.
cards.flavor:

cards.name: Zuran Spellcaster
cards.text: {T}: Zuran Spellcaster deals 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor:
"A mage must be precise as well as potent; cautious, as well as clever."
-Zur the Enchanter

cards.name: Abyssal Specter
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
cards.flavor:
"Open the gates, and bid them enter."
-Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.name: Ashen Ghoul

Haste
{B}: Return Ashen Ghoul from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if three or more creature cards are above Ashen Ghoul.

{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
{1}{U}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Counter target creature spell.
cards.flavor:
"The Shamans of Marit Lage do her bidding in secret, but they do it gladly."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

Enchant creature card in a graveyard
When Dance of the Dead enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Dance of the Dead." Put enchanted creature card onto the battlefield tapped under your control and attach Dance of the Dead to it. When Dance of the Dead leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may pay {1}{B}. If the player does, untap that creature.

cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:

cards.name: Dark Ritual
cards.text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
cards.flavor:
"Leshrac, my liege, grant me the power I am due."
-Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.name: Demonic Consultation
cards.text: Choose a card name. Exile the top six cards of your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with the chosen name. Put that card into your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

cards.name: Dread Wight

Each of those creatures gains "{4}: Remove a paralyzation counter from this creature."

cards.name: Drift of the Dead
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)

cards.flavor:

-Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has fear. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

-Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.text:

{B}, Pay 1 life: Return Foul Familiar to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Gravebind

Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

Enchant creature

cards.name: Legions of Lim-Dûl

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has swampwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

Whenever an opponent casts a green spell, you may pay {B}{B}. If you do, look at that player's hand and choose a card from it. The player discards that card.

cards.name: Seizures

Enchant creature

cards.name: Soul Kiss
cards.text:
Enchant creature
{B}, Pay 1 life: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.

cards.name: Stromgald Cabal

"Kjeldor must be supreme at any cost."
-Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

-Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.name: Aggression
cards.text:
Enchant non-Wall creature
Enchanted creature has first strike and trample.
At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, destroy that creature if it didn't attack this turn.
cards.flavor: The star that burns twice as bright burns half as long.

cards.name: Anarchy
cards.text: Destroy all white permanents.
cards.flavor:
"The Shaman waved the staff, and the land itself went mad."

cards.name: Avalanche
cards.text: Destroy X target snow lands.
cards.flavor:
"The pass was completely blocked by the avalanche; we're forced to turn back. Nevertheless, we've gone farther and seen more than any before us."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Balduvian Barbarians
cards.flavor:
"Barbarian raids were a concern to those living in the northwest provinces, but the Skyknights never dealt with the problem in a systematic way. They thought of the Balduvians as an 'amusing model' of their forebears' culture."
-Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

cards.name: Balduvian Hydra
cards.text:
Balduvian Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+0 counters on it.
Remove a +1/+0 counter from Balduvian Hydra: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Balduvian Hydra this turn.
{R}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+0 counter on Balduvian Hydra. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

cards.name: Battle Frenzy

cards.flavor: Rattle me bones as I cross the floor And the bones in your grave will rattle no more.

cards.name: Brand of Ill Omen

Enchant creature

cards.flavor:

First strike

cards.name: Conquer
cards.text:
Enchant land
You control enchanted land.
cards.flavor:
"Why do we trade with those despicable Elves? You don't live in forests, you burn them!"
-Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

cards.name: Curse of Marit Lage
cards.text:
When Curse of Marit Lage enters the battlefield, tap all Islands.

cards.flavor:
"Our world has not felt her thundering steps in lifetimes, but Marit Lage's presence is still with us."

cards.name: Dwarven Armory
cards.text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +2/+2 counter on target creature. Activate this ability only during any upkeep step.

"Few of us left, now. Confounded Yeti have opened all the vents. We'd best hide here with the weapons."

cards.name: Errantry

Enchant creature

cards.flavor:
"There is no shame in solitude. The lone Knight may succeed where a hundred founder."
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Flame Spirit
cards.text: {R}: Flame Spirit gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

"The spirit of the flame is the spirit of change."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Flare

cards.name: Glacial Crevasses
cards.text: Sacrifice a snow Mountain: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
cards.flavor:
"We were chasing Lim-Dûl when the ridge in front of us suddenly crumbled. I can't believe it was mere coincidence."

Trample

{R}{R}{R}{R}, {T}: Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn. Destroy it at end of combat.

cards.name: Goblin Ski Patrol
cards.text: {1}{R}: Goblin Ski Patrol gets +2/+0 and gains flying. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only once and only if you control a snow Mountain.
cards.flavor:
"AIIIEEEE!"
-Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

cards.name: Goblin Snowman
cards.text:
Whenever Goblin Snowman blocks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn.
{T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.
cards.flavor:
"Strength in numbers? Right."
-Ib Halfheart, Goblin Tactician

cards.name: Grizzled Wolverine
cards.text: {R}: Grizzled Wolverine gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during the declare blockers step, only if at least one creature is blocking Grizzled Wolverine, and only once each turn.
cards.flavor:
"Before you release a Wolverine from the trap, make sure it's really dead."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Imposing Visage
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
cards.flavor:
"I can't believe they expect me to fight with this rabble. A Goblin in a big mask sends 'em running for cover."
-Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

cards.name: Incinerate
cards.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description."
-Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Jokulhaups
cards.text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"I was shocked when I first saw the aftermath of the Yavimaya Valley disaster. The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Karplusan Giant
cards.text: Tap an untapped snow land you control: Karplusan Giant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"They aren't the brightest or the quickest of Giants. For that matter, the same holds true if you compare them to rocks."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Karplusan Yeti
cards.text: {T}: Karplusan Yeti deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Karplusan Yeti.
cards.flavor:
"What's that smell?"
-Perena Deepcutter, Dwarven Armorer

cards.name: Lava Burst
cards.text: Lava Burst deals X damage to any target. If Lava Burst would deal damage to a creature, that damage can't be prevented or dealt instead to another permanent or player.
cards.flavor:
"Overkill? This isn't a game of Kick-the-Ouphe!"
-Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Márton Stromgald
cards.text:
Whenever Márton Stromgald attacks, other attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each attacking creature other than Márton Stromgald.
Whenever Márton Stromgald blocks, other blocking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn for each blocking creature other than Márton Stromgald.

cards.name: Melee
cards.text:
Cast this spell only during your turn and only during combat before blockers are declared.
You choose which creatures block this combat and how those creatures block.
Whenever a creature attacks and isn't blocked this combat, untap it and remove it from combat.

cards.name: Melting
cards.text: All lands are no longer snow.
cards.flavor:
"Who needs the sun when you've got me around?"
-Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Meteor Shower
cards.text: Meteor Shower deals X plus 1 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
cards.flavor:
"Eenie, meenie, minie, moe . . . oh, why not all of them?"
-Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Mountain Goat
cards.text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
cards.flavor:
"Folklore has it that to capture a Mountain Goat is a sign of divine blessing. I just know it's a sign that dinner is on the way."
-Klazina Jansdotter, Leader of the Order of the Sacred Torch

cards.name: Mudslide
cards.text:
Creatures without flying don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped creatures without flying they control and pay {2} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

cards.name: Orcish Cannoneers
cards.text: {T}: Orcish Cannoneers deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"It's a thankless job, and you'll probably die in an explosion. But the pay is pretty good."
-Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

cards.name: Orcish Conscripts
cards.text:
Orcish Conscripts can't attack unless at least two other creatures attack.
Orcish Conscripts can't block unless at least two other creatures block.

cards.name: Orcish Farmer
cards.text: {T}: Target land becomes a Swamp until its controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor:
"Yes, the Farmers keep our soldiers fed. But why do they have to make every battlefield a pigpen?"
-Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

cards.name: Orcish Healer
cards.text:
{R}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
{B}{B}{R}, {T}: Regenerate target black or green creature.
{R}{G}{G}, {T}: Regenerate target black or green creature.

cards.name: Orcish Librarian
cards.text: {R}, {T}: Look at the top eight cards of your library. Exile four of them at random, then put the rest on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor: Us hungry, need food . . . . Lots of books . . . . Hmm . . . .

cards.name: Orcish Lumberjack
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G}.
cards.flavor:
"How did I ever let myself get talked into this project?"
-Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

cards.name: Orcish Squatters
cards.text: Whenever Orcish Squatters attacks and isn't blocked, you may gain control of target land defending player controls for as long as you control Orcish Squatters. If you do, Orcish Squatters assigns no combat damage this turn.

cards.name: Panic
cards.text:
Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared.
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"If you'd been there, you would've run from that deer, too!"
-Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Pyroblast
cards.text:
Choose one -
• Counter target spell if it's blue.
• Destroy target permanent if it's blue.
cards.flavor:
"Just the thing for those pesky water mages."
-Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Pyroclasm
cards.text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
cards.flavor:
"Leaves more room for the big ones to fight in, you know."
-Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Sabretooth Tiger
cards.text: First strike
cards.flavor:
"Daughter, it is now your turn to hunt the Tiger, and make a blanket of its fur."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Shatter
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.
cards.flavor:
"Let the past be the past. Do not call up that which you cannot put down. Destroy that which destroyed us, so long ago."
-Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

cards.name: Stone Rain
cards.text: Destroy target land.
cards.flavor:
"May the forces that took Argoth beneath the waves never come among us again."
-Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Stone Spirit
cards.text: Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
cards.flavor:
"The spirit of the stone is the spirit of strength."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Stonehands
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Trust in the power of stone. Stone is strong; stone shatters swords; stone breaks bones. Trust in stone."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Tor Giant
cards.flavor:
"What do you do then? Run. Run very fast. Don't stop until you see the camp-or a bigger Giant."
-Toothlicker Harj, Orcish Captain

cards.name: Total War
cards.text: Whenever a player attacks with one or more creatures, destroy all untapped non-Wall creatures that player controls that didn't attack, except for creatures the player hasn't controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn.

cards.name: Vertigo
cards.text: Vertigo deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. That creature loses flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"I saw the wizard gesturing, but I didn't guess his plan until my Aesthir cried out and went into a dive."
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Wall of Lava
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{R}: Wall of Lava gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Now there's something you don't see every day."
-Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Word of Blasting
cards.text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's converted mana cost to the Wall's controller.
cards.flavor:
"Walls? What walls?"
-Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

cards.name: Aurochs
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Aurochs attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Aurochs.
cards.flavor: One Auroch may feed a village, but a herd will flatten it.

cards.name: Balduvian Bears
cards.flavor:
"They're a hardy bunch, but I'd still bet that they just slept through the worst of the cold times."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Blizzard
cards.text:
Cast this spell only if you control a snow land.
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Creatures with flying don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

cards.name: Brown Ouphe
cards.text: {1}{G}, {T}: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
cards.flavor:
"Ouphes love trinkets and love to take them apart. I only wish they wouldn't do so with the magical ones."
-Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

cards.name: Chub Toad
cards.text: Whenever Chub Toad blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
Chub Toad, Chub Toad
At the door.
Run away quick
Or you'll run no more.
-Traditional children's rhyme

cards.name: Dire Wolves
cards.text: Dire Wolves has banding as long as you control a Plains. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:
"It's amazing how scared a city kid can get at a dog. Now, of course, I'd cross Terisiare alone, and keep no watch if I had a pack of greys hanging on my flanks as I went."
-Oddveig Ulfsson, caravan scout

cards.name: Earthlore
cards.text:
Enchant land you control
Tap enchanted land: Target blocking creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if enchanted land is untapped.
cards.flavor:
"Even the ground is our friend."
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Elder Druid
cards.text: {3}{G}, {T}: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.
cards.flavor:
"I am older than any Elder Druid before me, and still no child has been born with the Mark to take my place. When will the wheel turn?"
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Essence Filter
cards.text: Destroy all enchantments or all nonwhite enchantments.
cards.flavor:
"Freyalise has cleansed our bodies and minds of the plagues of Kjeldor; all she asks in return is that we keep pure our newly given home in Fyndhorn."
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Fanatical Fever
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Let go your fury, and hone your anger. Become the fist of Freyalise!"
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Folk of the Pines
cards.text: {1}{G}: Folk of the Pines gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Our friends of the forest take many forms, yet all serve the will of Freyalise."
-Laina of the Elvish Council

cards.name: Forbidden Lore
cards.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn."

cards.name: Forgotten Lore
cards.text: Target opponent chooses a card in your graveyard. You may pay {G}. If you do, repeat this process except that opponent can't choose a card already chosen for Forgotten Lore. Then put the last chosen card into your hand.
cards.flavor: In ashes are the gems of history.

cards.name: Foxfire
cards.text:
Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"Only the foolish fear Foxfire."
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Freyalise Supplicant
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice a red or white creature: Freyalise Supplicant deals damage to any target equal to half the sacrificed creature's power, rounded down.
cards.flavor:
"We have joined with the Druids of the Juniper Order. Our faith is one."
-Laina of the Elvish Council

cards.name: Freyalise's Charm
cards.text:
Whenever an opponent casts a black spell, you may pay {G}{G}. If you do, you draw a card.
{G}{G}: Return Freyalise's Charm to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Freyalise's Winds
cards.text:
Whenever a permanent becomes tapped, put a wind counter on it.
If a permanent with a wind counter on it would untap during its controller's untap step, remove all wind counters from it instead.

cards.name: Fyndhorn Brownie
cards.text: {2}{G}, {T}: Untap target creature.
cards.flavor:
"I've been insulted by drunks in a hundred inns, but never as skillfully or annoyingly as by those blasted Brownies."
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Fyndhorn Elder
cards.text: {T}: Add {G}{G}.
cards.flavor:
"Do we know what we're doing? Yes-the will of Freyalise."
-Laina of the Elvish Council

cards.name: Fyndhorn Elves
cards.text: {T}: Add {G}.
cards.flavor:
"Living side by side with the Elves for so long leaves me with no doubt that we serve the same goddess."
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Fyndhorn Pollen
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
All creatures get -1/-0.
{1}{G}: All creatures get -1/-0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"I breathed deeply, and suddenly I knew not who or where I was."
-Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

cards.name: Giant Growth
cards.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"Here in Fyndhorn, the goddess Freyalise is generous to her children."
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Gorilla Pack
cards.text:
Gorilla Pack can't attack unless defending player controls a Forest.
When you control no Forests, sacrifice Gorilla Pack.
cards.flavor:
"We learned this at a dear price: once you cross the great river, get through the Yavimaya forest at top speed."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Hot Springs
cards.text:
Enchant land you control
Enchanted land has "{T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn."
cards.flavor: Warmth is life; heat is peace.

cards.name: Hurricane
cards.text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
cards.flavor:
"This was quite possibly the least pleasant occurrence on the entire expedition."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Johtull Wurm
cards.text: Whenever Johtull Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -2/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.
cards.flavor:
"To bring her down we must be on all sides at once-leave one avenue open and we'll all be dead."
-Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

cards.name: Juniper Order Druid
cards.text: {T}: Untap target land.
cards.flavor:
"The filthy towns of Kjeldor are no place for anyone to live. Fyndhorn is our home now."
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

foreignPrintings.name: Druida de la Orden del Enebro

cards.name: Lhurgoyf
cards.text: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
cards.flavor:
"Ach! Hans, run! It's the Lhurgoyf!"
-Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

cards.name: Lure
cards.text:
Enchant creature
All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

cards.name: Maddening Wind
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Cumulative upkeep {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Maddening Wind deals 2 damage to that player.
cards.flavor:
"It is Freyalise, walking on the world."
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Nature's Lore
cards.text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor:
"Fyndhorn is our home."
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Pale Bears
cards.text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
cards.flavor:
"Daughter, on the day you have killed your Pale Bear, then will I give you your true name."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Pygmy Allosaurus
cards.text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
cards.flavor:
"I don't understand the appeal of keeping these things as pets, unless you want your children eaten."
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Pyknite
cards.text: When Pyknite enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
cards.flavor:
"Never cross a Pyknite, if you value your scalp."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Regeneration
cards.text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
{G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
cards.flavor:
"Faith in Freyalise has given me the gift, not the curse, of unprecedented longevity."
-Laina of the Elvish Council

cards.name: Rime Dryad
cards.text: Snow forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a snow Forest.)
cards.flavor:
"The Dryads told us to stay, as no new horrors would come when it was so cold. Three of us left anyway. The rest believed their lies, and their skeletons weren't found until the thaw."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Ritual of Subdual
cards.text:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
If a land is tapped for mana, it produces colorless mana instead of any other type.
cards.flavor:
"That which does not bend to the will of Freyalise shall surely break."
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Scaled Wurm
cards.flavor:
"Flourishing during the Ice Age, these Wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares-they embodied the worst of the Ice Age."
-Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

cards.name: Shambling Strider
cards.text: {R}{G}: Shambling Strider gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Freyalise forbid that any stranger should wander into the Striders' territory.

cards.name: Snowblind
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-Y. If that creature is attacking, X is the number of snow lands defending player controls. Otherwise, X is the number of snow lands its controller controls. Y is equal to X or to enchanted creature's toughness minus 1, whichever is smaller.

cards.name: Stampede
cards.text: Attacking creatures get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"We could see the horizon blacken with the great beasts, but it was too late. The icefield offered no immediate safety, but luckily most of us reached a crevasse in which we could take cover."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Stunted Growth
cards.text: Target player chooses three cards from their hand and puts them on top of their library in any order.

cards.name: Tarpan
cards.text: When Tarpan dies, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"A good Tarpan will serve you, faithful and true. A bad one will kick you in the head."
-General Jarkeld, the Arctic Fox

cards.name: Thermokarst
cards.text: Destroy target land. If that land was a snow land, you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"Finally we understand the lesson of our home: loss begets renewal."
-Kolbjörn, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

cards.name: Thoughtleech
cards.text: Whenever an Island an opponent controls becomes tapped, you may gain 1 life.
cards.flavor:
"A resourceful mage has many sources of information. The best one is your foe."
-Zur the Enchanter

cards.name: Tinder Wall
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R}.
{R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: It deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

cards.name: Touch of Vitae
cards.text:
Until end of turn, target creature gains haste and "{0}: Untap this creature. Activate this ability only once."
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Trailblazer
cards.text: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor:
"Our Elvish Hunter Taaveti led us swiftly along hidden paths through the dense forest. We caught the Orcs from behind, and completely by surprise."
-Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

cards.name: Venomous Breath
cards.text: Choose target creature. At this turn's next end of combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked by it this turn.

cards.name: Wall of Pine Needles
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{G}: Regenerate Wall of Pine Needles.
cards.flavor: The power of the forest takes a hundred forms. Some are more surprising than others.

cards.name: Whiteout
cards.text:
All creatures lose flying until end of turn.
Sacrifice a snow land: Return Whiteout from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Wiitigo
cards.text:
Wiitigo enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Wiitigo if it has blocked or been blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

cards.name: Wild Growth
cards.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.
cards.flavor:
"Here in Fyndhorn, where Freyalise's power is strongest, the forest has its own opinion."
-Laina of the Elvish Council

cards.name: Woolly Mammoths
cards.text: Woolly Mammoths has trample as long as you control a snow land.
cards.flavor:
"Mammoths may be good to ride on, but they're certainly bad to fall off of!"
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Woolly Spider
cards.text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a Spider without an appetite."
-Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

cards.name: Yavimaya Gnats
cards.text:
Flying
{G}: Regenerate Yavimaya Gnats.
cards.flavor:
"It is our third day of travel on the Yavimaya River, and still these creatures plague us. Davin Lansson, our naturalist, has facetiously labeled them 'gnats,' and the name has stuck."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Altar of Bone
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Centaur Archer
cards.text: {T}: Centaur Archer deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
cards.flavor:
"Centaurs will kill our Aesthir if they can; they've always been enemies. Destroy the horse-people on sight."
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Chromatic Armor
cards.text:
Enchant creature
As Chromatic Armor enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Chromatic Armor enters the battlefield with a sleight counter on it.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature by sources of the last chosen color.
{X}: Put a sleight counter on Chromatic Armor and choose a color. X is the number of sleight counters on Chromatic Armor.

cards.name: Diabolic Vision
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on top of your library in any order.
cards.flavor:
"I have seen the true path. I will not warm myself by the fire-I will become the flame."
-Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.name: Earthlink
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Earthlink unless you pay {2}.
Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller sacrifices a land.

cards.name: Elemental Augury
cards.text: {3}: Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put them back in any order.
cards.flavor:
"It is the changing of perception that is important."
-Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

cards.name: Essence Vortex
cards.text: Destroy target creature unless its controller pays life equal to its toughness. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: Masters who sacrifice for servants will receive the gift of loyalty.

cards.name: Fiery Justice
cards.text: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Target opponent gains 5 life.
cards.flavor:
"The fire of justice burns like nothing else."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Fire Covenant
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
Fire Covenant deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

cards.name: Flooded Woodlands
cards.text: Green creatures can't attack unless their controller sacrifices a land for each green creature they control that's attacking. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)
cards.flavor: Freyalise's tears bring life and renewal, though they also bring trouble.

cards.name: Fumarole
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 3 life.
Destroy target creature and target land.
cards.flavor:
"Too many of us have died in the explosions that wrack these hills."
-Klazina Jansdotter, Leader of the Order of the Sacred Torch

cards.name: Ghostly Flame
cards.text: Black and/or red permanents and spells are colorless sources of damage.
cards.flavor:
"Walk slowly when in the nether world, and seek that which calls."
-Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.name: Giant Trap Door Spider
cards.text: {1}{R}{G}, {T}: Exile Giant Trap Door Spider and target creature without flying that's attacking you.
cards.flavor:
"So large and so quiet-a combination best avoided."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Glaciers
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Glaciers unless you pay {W}{U}.
All Mountains are Plains.
cards.flavor:
"Even the highest mountain can be ground to dust."
-Lucilde Fiksdotter, Leader of the Order of the White Shield

cards.name: Hymn of Rebirth
cards.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor:
"There will come soft rains, and spring shall be amongst us, a welcome friend."
-Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran Priest

cards.name: Kjeldoran Frostbeast
cards.text: At end of combat, destroy all creatures blocking or blocked by Kjeldoran Frostbeast.
cards.flavor:
"Two of my Warriors found that the creature was dangerous not only in combat, but also in simple proximity."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Merieke Ri Berit
cards.text:
Merieke Ri Berit doesn't untap during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Merieke Ri Berit. When Merieke Ri Berit leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.

cards.name: Monsoon
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's end step, tap all untapped Islands that player controls and Monsoon deals X damage to the player, where X is the number of Islands tapped this way.
cards.flavor:
"No one in her right mind would venture off the coast of Kjeldor during this season."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Mountain Titan
cards.text: {1}{R}{R}: Until end of turn, whenever you cast a black spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Mountain Titan.
cards.flavor:
"The Titans claimed to draw strength from the rocks, but I suspect them of some darker allegiance."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Reclamation
cards.text: Black creatures can't attack unless their controller sacrifices a land for each black creature they control that's attacking. (This cost is paid as attackers are declared.)
cards.flavor:
"We shall oppose Lim-Dûl and his forces by any means necessary, even if the very earth be torn asunder."
-Arna Kennerüd, Skyknight

cards.name: Skeleton Ship
cards.text:
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Skeleton Ship.
{T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
cards.flavor:
"The sea gives up her dead as easily as the soil."
-Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

cards.name: Spectral Shield
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2 and can't be the target of spells.
cards.flavor:
"What can be a stronger shield than concealment? Have you ever defeated an enemy you didn't know existed?"
-Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

cards.name: Storm Spirit
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Storm Spirit deals 2 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor:
"Come to us, with your lightning. Come to us, with your thunder. Serve us with your strength, and smite our foes with your power."
-Steinar Icefist, Balduvian Shaman

cards.name: Stormbind
cards.text: {2}, Discard a card at random: Stormbind deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor:
"Once, our people could call down the storm itself to do our bidding."
-Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

cards.name: Wings of Aesthir
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying and first strike.
cards.flavor:
"For those of courage, even the sky holds no limit."
-Arnjlot Olasson, Sky Mage

cards.name: Adarkar Sentinel
cards.text: {1}: Adarkar Sentinel gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"We encountered the Sentinels in the wastes, near no living thing. Their purpose was inscrutable."
-Disa the Restless, journal entry

cards.name: Aegis of the Meek
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"With this marvel, even the weak have a fighting chance!"
-Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

{T}, Sacrifice Amulet of Quoz: Target opponent may ante the top card of their library. If they don't, you flip a coin. If you win the flip, that player loses the game. If you lose the flip, you lose the game. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

cards.name: Arcum's Sleigh
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn. Activate this ability only during combat and only if defending player controls a snow land.
cards.flavor:
"With the proper equipment and caution, one can travel anywhere."
-Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Arcum's Weathervane

{2}, {T}: Target snow land is no longer snow.
{2}, {T}: Target nonsnow basic land becomes snow.

cards.name: Arcum's Whistle
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Choose target non-Wall creature the active player has controlled continuously since the beginning of the turn. That player may pay {X}, where X is that creature's converted mana cost. If they don't pay, the creature attacks this turn if able, and at the beginning of the next end step, destroy it if it didn't attack this turn. Activate this ability only before attackers are declared.

cards.name: Barbed Sextant
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Barbed Sextant: Add one mana of any color. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

cards.name: Baton of Morale

If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
cards.flavor:
"The Goblins would kill to get ahold of this one."
-Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

cards.name: Celestial Sword
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor:
"So great is its power, only the chosen can wield it and live."
-Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

cards.name: Crown of the Ages

cards.name: Despotic Scepter
cards.text: {T}: Destroy target permanent you own. It can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor:
"We were not meant to have such terrible things. They should be left where we found them, if not destroyed!"
-Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

cards.name: Elkin Bottle
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Exile the top card of your library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card.

cards.name: Fyndhorn Bow
cards.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"With a bow like this, the hunting is always good."
-Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

If you lose the flip, Goblin Lyre deals damage to you equal to the number of creatures that opponent or that planeswalker's controller controls.

{T}, Remove a charge counter from Ice Cauldron: Add Ice Cauldron's last noted type and amount of mana. Spend this mana only to cast the last card exiled with Ice Cauldron.

"The scavengers who first found it called it the 'Bone Crank.' Not a bad name, I'd say."
-Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

cards.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {3}. If you do, untap target permanent.

"Take this item, for instance. How would it destroy us, Relicbane?"

cards.flavor: They look human- until they bleed.

-Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

cards.flavor:
"I dispute Relicbane's hysterical allegations, Commissioner, but it is true that these artifacts can be dangerous."
-Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist
